title: Google Assistant ‘Quick phrases’: What they can do, and what languages can use them
content:
One interesting enhancement of the Pixel 6 series is the Google Assistant’s new “Quick phrases” that let you get certain things done without saying “Hey Google” first. Here’s what all they can do, when they work, and what languages you can use them in.

more…

The post Google Assistant ‘Quick phrases’: What they can do, and what languages can use them appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Assistant's new "Quick phrases" let you get certain things done on Pixel 6 without saying "Hey Google" first. Here's how they work.
